function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited press freedom and threat of jail time for reporting on the virus","Impact":"Misleading information about the virus and its spread","Mitigation":"Promotion of press freedom and protection of journalists","Technologies":"Media monitoring tools and fact-checking software","People":"Journalists, media organizations, and the public","Owner":"Government, media organizations, and international bodies"},{"Description":"Strict measures and lockdown may have been eased too early","Impact":"Resurgence of COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Careful monitoring of infection rates and rapid response to any spikes","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps and predictive modeling","People":"Public health officials, government, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health organizations and government"},{"Description":"State of emergency and unlimited power to rule by decree","Impact":"Abuse of power and potential for undemocratic decision-making","Mitigation":"Establishment of checks and balances, and adherence to democratic principles","Technologies":"Governance monitoring tools and public accountability platforms","People":"Citizens and democratic institutions","Owner":"Citizens, civil society, and international organizations"}]}
